Name: minimize_overallocated_workers
Description: Keep individual availability within sustainable limits

Name: minimize_tasks_without_story
Description: Avoid tasks not linked to any user story

Name: maximize_definition_of_done_alignment
Description: Ensure tasks meet DoD status before review

Name: minimize_unplanned_scope
Description: Limit scope creep within a sprint

Name: maximize_acceptance_criteria_coverage
Description: Stories must include acceptance criteria before start

Name: minimize_unreviewed_code
Description: Ensure code review occurs for all tasks

Name: maximize_stakeholder_participation
Description: Encourage stakeholder attendance in sprint reviews

Name: minimize_overlong_daily_scrum
Description: Keep daily scrum within time box

Name: maximize_planning_outcome_quality
Description: Require documented outcome from sprint planning

Name: maximize_feature_documentation_linkage
Description: Every feature should have linked documentation
